# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="900ef-102">讀取回執</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="900ef-103">若要在 Outlook 網頁版中要求閱讀回執或郵件的送達回執，請執行下列動作：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="900ef-104">選取三個點</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="900ef-105">在郵件撰寫窗格的頂端。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="900ef-106">選取 [ **顯示郵件選項**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="900ef-107">選取 [ **要求已讀的收貨** ] 或 [ **要求傳遞回執**]，或是兩者都要求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="900ef-108">若要選擇 Outlook 對讀取回執要求的回應方式，請移至</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="900ef-109">**設定**  > **流覽所有 Outlook 設定**  > **郵件處理**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="900ef-110">如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [web 上 Outlook 中的「讀取回執](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157)」。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="900ef-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
